text: Thank you so much that really helped . I want to start looking for places where I can do volunteering and I'm also interested in applying for summer schools. My interests in science are forensics science , biochemistry and biological science .

Volunteering anywhere? I'd suggest volunteering somewhere unrelated to what you want to do so you can show a range of skills and interests on your uni application. I can give you more advice there if you tell me the kinds of things you'd like to do.
I'm not sure about any specific summer schools but I know unis like Imperial do summer events and of course they're a science based uni so definitely worth looking into. My best friend studied biochemistry there
Are you thinking about any particular unis already? Also what are your grades like, if you don't mind me asking?
